SummaryEnglish: After saving the world, the strongest hero Leo became someone who is not wanted in the peaceful human world. He was too strong. Exiled, he seeks a job at the Demon King's Army, which he had defeated and needs to be rebuilt. The Army had many problems: too much work, financial troubles, etc. Leo starts to make things better using his power. Leo encounters Echidna again, and asks her why she invaded the human world. There was an unexpected story...!
Aliases: Yuusha, Yamemasu: Tsugi no Shokuba wa Maoujou
Yūsha, Yamemasu: Tsugi no Shokuba wa Maōjō
勇者、辞めます ～次の職場は魔王城～

1.TitleEnglish: Remember, the Work Trip is First and Foremost a Learning Opportunity (Part 1)
1.SummaryEnglish: Officially, they’re all at an inn with a hot spring for a business trip. Unofficially, it’s a well-deserved vacation. It sounds like the perfect getaway, but little do they know that the inn’s haunted.

2.TitleEnglish: Remember, the Work Trip is First and Foremost a Learning Opportunity (Part 2)
2.SummaryEnglish: One by one, the ghost claims Leo's friends. But not without reason…

1.TitleEnglish: My Next Interview's at the Demon Queen's Palace!
1.SummaryEnglish: Rarely does a hero apply for a job with the Demon Queen. He has the skills, but he’s the one who defeated her army. Maybe he can clarify matters during his interview?

2.TitleEnglish: Strive to Ease the Burden on Your Future Self!
2.SummaryEnglish: Shutina is a model employee, but she’s overworked, overwhelmed and stressed out. If he can stop irritating her for five minutes, Leo can help her delegate and avoid burnout.

3.TitleEnglish: A Little Bit of Thought Goes A Long Way for Efficiency!
3.SummaryEnglish: Whose idea was it to put Lily in charge of logistics? Why are her proposals drawn up in crayon!? It’s up to Leo to give her a training and development course on teamwork.

4.SummaryEnglish: There are certain rules one must follow when the boss invites an employee out for food and drinks. Especially when said employee is concealing his true identity.

5.TitleEnglish: If You Want to Quit, Talk It Out First
5.SummaryEnglish: There's nothing wrong with quitting a job if it's not a good fit. But one must make sure that it's the best move for them and not something they'll eventually regret.

6.TitleEnglish: The Hero Shares His Tale of Burden
6.SummaryEnglish: Listening is a vital part of communication, and Mernes is perceptive enough to know that Leo is holding something back. So the former hero confides his secret to the assassin.

7.TitleEnglish: A Good Warrior Isn't Always A Good Boss
7.SummaryEnglish: Edvard is a good warrior, but that doesn’t mean he’s a good leader. Especially when he thinks his troops aren’t trying hard enough when they fail at tasks he can accomplish.

8.SummaryEnglish: People are more than their jobs. Long ago, an unexpected friendship set Leo on the path he walks to this day.

9.SummaryEnglish: Time is running out for demonkind. Leo may have a solution, but that means revealing his identity to Echidna.

10.TitleEnglish: I'll Save the World, Even If That Means Destroying It
10.SummaryEnglish: The only ones who can save the world from the hero are the Demon Queen and her four generals!

11.SummaryEnglish: Leo is a grave threat to the world, and no one understands that better than the former hero himself.

12.SummaryEnglish: In the end, what does it mean to be a hero?
